line: you remembered to put clothes on this morning
oh joey it is so great to be back here
i gotta tell you you are making it so easy on me and emma
hey it is great having you back
you know stay as long as you want and when does she stop crying all night
so hey rach when will we expect to see you tonight
well probably be back to pick her up around six but she is in the bedroom all ready to go
but she did actually fall back to sleep so
she is probably exhausted from all that adorable screaming she did last night
hey i hope emma is not making it too hard on you
no hey it is been great
and look i just want you to know that with rachel staying here and everything all my feelings from before are totally over okay
and even if they were not when you accidentally walk in on a woman using a breast pump
sure i mean do i wish me and rachel living together would have worked out
you know disappointed but it is not like it is a divorce
no it is not a divorce it is not a divorce
anyway i think rachel and i need to you know get on with our lives maybe maybe start seeing other people
in fact if you know anyone that would be good for me
sure i know lots of girls
i was just gonna get something to eat
okay let us see we got strained peas strained carrots
we have not tried that yet
so how is it living with rachel again
i mean apart from the great food
fine fine it is just it is just weird what is happening with her and ross
you know yesterday he asked me to fix him up with somebody
oh my god rachel asked me if i knew anyone for her too
they are so perfect for each other it is crazy
what is it like two bites in here
i just wish they had realise they should be together
and when they moved back in together i figured yknow that is where things were headed
they should get married and have more children
yes and they should name one of their kids joey
i may not have kids someones gotta carry on the family name
maybe once they start dating and they see what is out there they will realise how good they are for each other
yeah because it is slim pickings
i had this date last night yuck
but we should probably keep it down she is still in the bedroom
so what are we gonna do
are we just gonna go ahead and set them up with people
i know that just pushes them further and further apart
oh i know what we can do
we could set ross and rachel up on horrible dates so that they will realise how good they are together
ooh that is a great plan
yeah you know what the best part of it is
i get to do my plan laugh
not so loud we do not wanna wake up uh
you guys are not doing anything tonight are you
see now why would you assume that
i will have you know that we are very hip happening people
now if you will excuse me i have to get back to reading the obituaries
i was just asking because i need someone to watch emma tonight
well phoebe set me up on a date
just figured because you and ross are
what slept together a year and a half ago
well i think it is great that you are going on a date you know
turn off oprah and send out a resume
so bring her by around seven
oh you guys are gonna have so much fun
she is at such a cute age
now that she is eating solid food she poops around the clock
and watch out for your hair because she likes to grab it
and oh she is also in this phase where if you leave the room she screams bloody murder but ah
suddenly i wish i was reading my own name
so excited i just set up rachel with the worst guy tonight
well it is this guy i used to massage
and by massage i mean hold down so he would not turn over and flash me
wait till you hear who i got for ross
she is this really boring woman
yeah yeah she is really into history and foreign movies
and oh oh she loves puzzles
you are you are ruining the plan
joey you have you have fixed him up with his perfect woman
oh my god you are right
how do you even know a woman like that
not allowed to know smart women
i met her at the library
so now what do we do
well okay just call her and tell her the dates cancelled and find him somebody else
what if we do not find him somebody else
we will just tell her the dates off but we do not tell ross and he goes to the restaurant and gets stood up
rachels gonna have a terrible date ross gets stood up and then they will realise how good they have it together
yeah you know it is not that fun
no i think we killed it
well i think go downstairs for a while
it is okay it is okay
do not cry it is just a bit
your uncle chandler funny is all i have
okay just so you know gonna be ovulating from tomorrow until the sixth so do not touch yourself in the next 48 hours
wait did you say until the sixth
i may have also served some very questionable meat at the restaurant
go take the test and see if we are okay
hey where are all my ovulation sticks
i might have checked to see if i was ovulating a couple times
there is not much to do around here
excuse me is there a woman waiting at the bar
someone average height dark hair perhaps doing a puzzle
uh there is a drunk chinese guy
well if still here in an hour buy him a drink on me
can i get you another glass of wine
nah i do not know if i should
i do not wanna be drunk when i go home alone
yeah it is no big deal
it is just a blind date
are you worried your date came saw you and left
oh good because as of four of the clock this afternoon i am not
i i do not think i can
i know you are not eighteen anymore but give it a minute
oh sweetie i forgot you were here
oh you are right we cannot do this
i mean how much can she even be aware of at this age
well she is aware when we leave the room
she may notice if we start
well i cannot say hump or screw in front of the b a b y
i mean i guess having s x in front of a baby is not so
something people go to jail for
when we stayed at that bed and breakfast you would not have s x with me because you thought a deer was staring through the window
but what kind of a sick b st rd wants to do it in front of a deer
i think gonna have the chicken
i i just have to say this you are really beautiful
oh well that is that is very sweet
oh come on you are way out of my league
bet that guy over there is probably saying ooh why she out with him
so what do think you wanna order
so if you were thinking well he is not that good looking but maybe we will have some laughs
well come on steve let us not rule out nervous laughter
phoebe told me that that you owned your own restaurant
i silk screen t shirts now
it is really fulfilling doing something you hate for no money
i have no money not funny i live in a studio apartment with two other guys and pretty sure infertile
now come on come on steve
there must be something that you like about yourself
going to hunt you down and kill you
this is the worst date ever
how could you set me up with this creep
you know you are talking about one of my dear dear friends
oh right so he gets a little crazy when he is stoned
did he go out for a cigarette
rachel is having a miserable time and ross is just stood up somewhere at a restaurant all alone
oh great pretty soon they will be back together
by the time anyones figured out what we have done we will be in sunny mexico
oh wait that is the end of a different plan
ooh she is asleep that means we can
yes but we have to be fast
and you cannot make any noise
why is the bedroom door closed
you cannot have s e x when you are taking care of the b a b i e
eh if it was meant to be it is meant to be
look you got stood up who cares
we are gonna show you a good time
in fact let me bring you a crab cake appetizer on the house
although i was hoping to have s x tonight
are you trying to get him to stay
just get out of here okay
what is what is going on
eh okay the waiters have a little pool going
we have a bet on how long it will take before you give up and go home
you you are making money off my misery
well if you stay till 9 20 i am
i i have never been so insulted in my life
now if you will wrap up my free crab cakes be on my way
you were loud and i was fast
i think we may have really done it this time
oh i wish i did not have to wait to take a pregnancy test
you may wanna get some more of those too
oh my god where is emma
do not ask me i was in there canoodling you
okay okay sure that rachel came home early and picked up emma
you go look across the hall and call her cell
hey you better hope that we are pregnant because one way or another we are giving a baby back to rachel
i i cannot believe i’m crying in front of you
no no no i admire a man who can cry
oh sorry it is my phone
hey rach how is it going
oh my god this is the worst date ever
look you know what sorry but did you really think that this was going well
hey did you stop by here
what do you mean there you are
oh we were playing peek a boo
she just – she loves it when dramatic
why the hell did you take her
because you two were having s x
do not you lie to me
i could tell by chandlers hair
cannot you get on top for once
all right all right we were
we were trying to make a baby
it is unacceptable that you two would have s x with emma in the next room
gonna have to tell rachel about this
unless you name your firstborn child joey
hey i may never have kids and somebodys gotta carry on my family name
look i think i know the answer to this question but
would you like to make love to me
eh it is just as well
all right well that is good to know
i just had a rough night
it is kind of weird talking to you about this but
monica told me you had a blind date
but is it technically a date if the other person does not show up
do you think she walked in saw you and left
why does everyone keep saying that
well if it makes you feel any better i wish my date had not shown up
well he makes t shirts for a living and he thought it would be appropriate to give me this
so they are gonna name their first child joey
how how do i get them to name the next one after me
it is easy you just walk in on them having s x
oh so they owe me like three phoebes
look it is ross and rachel
do not do not do the plan laugh
the first date we have had in months and they were both such disasters
you know it is weird that phoebe would set me up on a date that was awful on the same night that joey set you up on a date that did not even show
wait a minute you do not think it was intentional
i mean that is just stupid
yeah look at them look at them they are really bonding
oh yeah they are falling in love all over again
can you believe they are still not here
a double blind date and we both get stood up
can we have our free crab cakes now
and we want our free crab cakes
although we do have a pool going to see how long it takes that guy to cry
